title: New: Mood Indigo – Midnight Children
body: Having only dropped his [debut EP](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17854-review-mood-indigo-people-ep/) a matter of days ago, Boston’s **Mood Indigo** is already back with new music, in the form of the fantastic _Midnight Children_. Maintaining his glitch-hop production and slightly languid, almost Why-esque vocals, it’s a lament for future abandoned lovers, and yet another mightily promising track from the young artist. Check it out below, and grab a free download if it’s your sort of thing.
